video.title: WordWorld
video.synopsis: Join happy-go-lucky Duck and his many WordFriends as they solve fun challenges to learn their letters and create new words.

episodes.synopsis: When Sheep and Bear open Cat's box of O's, one rolls away; It's Dog's birthday, and all his friends are planning a surprise party.
episodes.title: Runaway O / Happy Birthday, Dog!

episodes.synopsis: Ant adds a G-I to his tiny frame and changes from ANT to GIANT; Pig gets a bowl stuck on his face, so Sheep must take over his cooking show.
episodes.title: There's an Ant in Every Giant / Chef Sheep

episodes.synopsis: Frog rescues the Little Piggies from the moon; Sheep discovers a large egg and has to take care of it until she can return it to its rightful owner.
episodes.title: Rocket to the Moon / The Birds

episodes.synopsis: When Pig's pie for Bear goes missing, it's up to Detective Sheep to solve the mystery; Duck mistakes Truck for a long-lost relative.
episodes.title: The Mystery of the DIsappearing Pie / Duck's Family Reunion

episodes.synopsis: Everyone except Duck is afraid of Shark and won't give him a chance to prove he's friendly; Dog is having trouble communicating with his friends.
episodes.title: Sh-Sh-Shark! / Dog Wants to Play Ball

episodes.synopsis: Pig learns an important lesson about keeping promises; Frog is staying as a guest at Pig's house, but he soon wears out his welcome.
episodes.title: Pies, Pies, Pies! / Waterlogged!

episodes.synopsis: Dog must face his fear of the dark on his first camping trip; the weather is turning colder, and Duck is ready for his yearly migration.
episodes.title: Dog's Camping Trip / V Is for Vacation

episodes.synopsis: Frog helps insomniac Bug figure out the end of a rhyme so he can go to sleep; Bear is keeping everyone in WordWorld awake with her all-night racket.
episodes.title: Snug as a Bug / Nightlight

episodes.synopsis: Duck attends his first sleepover party and is nervous about not sleeping in his nest; Sheep loses her top hat while practicing her magic act.
episodes.title: Duck's First Sleepover Party / One Hat Fits All

episodes.synopsis: Dog is excited for the WordWorld Concert, but he can't play an instrument; When Pig is too sick to cook the Moonlight Feast, his friends help out.
episodes.title: Dancing Dog / Pig's Big Moonlight Feast

episodes.synopsis: Ant is showcasing bands on his radio show, and Bug, Fly and Bee need help with their lyrics; Pig and Ant argue while playing Shuffleword.
episodes.title: Boppin' with the Bug Band / Shuffleword

episodes.synopsis: The WordFriends are using water to stay cool, but all the W's start to disappear; Bear and Sheep want to play princess, but they only have one crown.
episodes.title: W Drought / Princess Sheep

episodes.synopsis: Duck asks Frog to read his favorite book on Ant's radio station; Frog discovers that you can make a word "more than one" by adding the letter S to it.
episodes.title: Radio Read-A-Thon / Robots to the Rescue!

episodes.synopsis: Frog and the Bug Band are headed for the beach, but not everything goes as planned; Duck offers to help Kangaroo deliver letters to his friends.
episodes.title: Pl-Pl-Plane! / Mail Mix-Up

episodes.synopsis: The Three Little Pigs are making Pig a secret birthday present, and Pig promises not to peek; Duck helps a robot track down an important clock.
episodes.title: Pig's Present / Tick Tock Space Clock

episodes.synopsis: While playing on the beach, Duck and Shark discover a sand castle; Frog doesn't want to play in the rain because he doesn't like rain.
episodes.title: Castles in the Sea / Get Your Coat

episodes.synopsis: Sheep becomes WordWorld's first superhero, saving the day with the letter S; Sheep, Duck and Shark find a message in a bottle.
episodes.title: Superhero Sheep / Pirate Ship

episodes.synopsis: When Sheep and Duck think that Dog has a secret, they decide to play spy; Sheep rescues a tiny whale and brings her home to her haystack.
episodes.title: Playing Spies / Wee Little Whale

episodes.synopsis: Pig and Frog compete in a big race to Mystery Island; Duck gets a case of stage fright while singing "Twinkle, Twinkle, Little Star."
episodes.title: The Race to the Mystery Island / A Star Is Born

episodes.synopsis: Frog notices that Kangaroo's mail train is headed straight for a broken track; Duck wants to make Frog a big, beautiful birthday cake.
episodes.title: Back on Track / The Rainbow Birthday Cake

episodes.synopsis: It's Monkey's birthday, and a sick Frog asks Duck and Bug to bring Monkey's present to the party; Bear wants to play cowboys with Pig, Dog and Duck.
episodes.title: Bit By Bit / Ride 'em, Cowbear!

episodes.synopsis: The WordFriends play an exciting game of baseball, but Robot has never played before; Sheep and Bear get lost in the jungle, and it's almost dark.
episodes.title: Play Ball! / M Is for Map

episodes.synopsis: All the bugs in WordWorld are showing off their flying skills, but Ant can't fly; Duck encourages Shark to dance in his show.
episodes.title: Flying Ant / The Dancing Duck Bonanza

episodes.synopsis: When Duck accidentally breaks the L off Frog's lamp, he decides not to tell Frog; while Pig and Ant are making cookies, their bag of C's gets away.
episodes.title: The Lost Letter L / Catch That C!

episodes.synopsis: It's the night before Christmas, and Frog needs a star for his Christmas tree; All the WordFriends are excited about their presents from Santa.
episodes.title: The Christmas Star / A Christmas Present for Dog
